Title: ProxyToggleWPF
Description: Proxy ToggleWPF is a simple utility that makes turning your proxy settings on and off a breeze
HomeWiki:
Proxy Toggle WPF
===========

Proxy Toggle WPF is a simple utility that makes turning your proxy settings on and off a breeze. The UI helps your end users determine the state of their proxy settings.

Key Points
  • It can help decrease the amount of Service Desk calls from non-technical users who are having trouble connecting to WiFi.
  • It's useful for when travelling outside of your internal network (Home, Hotel, Starbucks, etc), ProxyToggle can help to reach those Hotel WiFi sign-in pages without suffering a redirect to an unreachable home page (:/).
  • Best of all, when you return to your company's internal network you can restore your saved proxy settings to the Registry with a flick of the switch!

Utilizes the excellent ToggleSwitchControl (https://github.com/ejensen/toggle-switch-control) & ModifyRegistryLibrary (http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/3389/Read-write-and-delete-from-registry-with-C)

Easily configurable through the included App.config. Built with WPF & C#
